cards: [ctx_1] California, United States — California SB976 — "Default Settings for Minors **Algorithmic Feeds Restriction:**"
[ctx_2] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Regular re-verification of minor status **Default Privacy Settings:**"
[ctx_3] California, United States — California SB976 — "Chronological feed must be the default display option"
[ctx_4] California, United States — California SB976 — "Social media platforms must disable algorithmic or personalized feeds by default for users under 18"

passages.text: Default Settings for Minors **Algorithmic Feeds Restriction:**
Regular re-verification of minor status **Default Privacy Settings:**
Chronological feed must be the default display option
Social media platforms must disable algorithmic or personalized feeds by default for users under 18
